strength_details: Clear responsibilities focused on BI/DW reporting and ETL with Cognos
Established company (IBM) with global delivery center experience
Specific technical requirements make role well-defined for qualified candidates
concern_details: Heavy focus on legacy tools (Cognos, DataStage) with no modern stack mentioned
Onsite work model in Pune with no work-life balance signals
No visa sponsorship mentioned - requires local work authorization in India
best_fit_details: Mid-level engineers with 3+ years in BI/DW projects using Cognos and ETL tools
Candidates experienced with enterprise environments and legacy systems
Those seeking stable roles in established tech companies rather than startups
probe_details: Ask about typical work hours and any on-call requirements
Understand the mix of legacy vs. modern tools in current projects
Inquire about career progression opportunities within IBM Consulting
leverage_details: Cognos Developer/Admin experience is a required skill - strong match if qualified
Experience with specific ETL tools (DataStage, Informatica) is valuable for this role
summary.overall_assessment: Stable opportunity for mid-level data engineers with BI/DW experience, particularly those skilled in Cognos and traditional ETL tools. IBM provides established company stability but with legacy technology focus and onsite requirements in Pune. Limited growth signals and no modern stack mentioned. Best for candidates seeking enterprise experience rather than innovation.
